President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un say they have the same ambitious goal - denuclearization of the Korean peninsula - at their upcoming summit in Singapore . But [ARG0: the two leaders] [ARGM-MNR: fundamentally] [V: disagree] [ARG2: about what that looks like] .
